subset_description: Pre-computed Palmer drought index outputs (PDSI, PHDI, PMDI, Z-Index) for 344 US climate divisions, used as regression test fixtures. Generated from the library's own Palmer implementation against NCEI nClimDiv input data.
citation: Palmer, W. C., 1965: Meteorological Drought. U.S. Weather Bureau Research Paper No. 45, 58 pp.
notes: Checksum computed from division 0101 only (cat $(ls *.npy | sort) | shasum -a 256). Full fixture contains 344 divisions. This provenance was added retroactively in v2.4.0.
